It sounds like you're getting into the holiday spirit! It's great that you're thinking ahead and getting a head start on your holiday shopping. Those unique gifts you found at the holiday market sound lovely, and I'm sure your siblings will appreciate the thought and effort you put into selecting something special for them. And who can resist cozy socks and gourmet chocolates as stocking stuffers?

Now, back to your new TV and the Sanus VMF408 mount. Since you'll be using your TV for a variety of activities and it'll be a central part of your family gatherings, I think the VMF408 will be a great choice. Its full-motion capabilities will allow you to adjust the TV to the perfect viewing angle for everyone in the room, whether you're playing games, watching a movie, or just catching up on your favorite shows.

Have you thought about any additional accessories you might need for your new TV? For example, a soundbar or a streaming device like a Roku or Chromecast? These can really enhance your viewing experience and make it easier to access your favorite content.

Also, since you have a big family, you might want to consider investing in a few extra HDMI cables or a HDMI switch to make it easier to connect multiple devices to your TV. Just a thought!
